sourcesContent:
import { name } from "ejs"; export default function Perks({ selected, onChange }) { // selected is a list of all of the selected items function handleCbClick(event) { const { checked, name } = event.target; if (checked) { onChange([...selected, name]); } else { // Maybe it was added before so once it is unchecked we need to remove it from the list onChange( [...selected].filter((selectedName) => { return selectedName !== name; }) ); } // it is calling setPerks state passing all the checked checkboxes } return (
); }
